version_description:
- Aramex offices are always up-to-date now
- Minor bug fixes
- 64 bit support

- Aramex offices are always up-to-date now
- Minor bug fixes
- 64 bit support

- UI alignment for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6+
- bug fixes

- UI alignment for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6+
- bug fixes

WHAT’S NEW

1. More Payment Options
Activate the Auto Pay feature in just one step and say goodbye to the hassle of logging in to make a payment every time you receive a shipment. Or, you can still choose Pay Now to make an online payment at your convenience. Both features work with PayPal, Credit Cards and others.

2. Enhanced Tracking and Notifications
Get important notifications on your online orders, from the moment we receive them at our facilities, all the way to delivery at your door.

3. Copy & Paste your Unique S&S Account Number and addresses worldwide.
Simply copy and paste any of your Shop & Ship addresses on your favorite website during checkout, including your Unique S&S Account Number. Less time spent typing, means more time for global shopping!

CLASSIC FEATURES

My Shipments
All the history & other details about your shipped packages, as far back as 6 months, ready for viewing anytime, anywhere.


My Addresses
Exact details of your personal Shop & Ship addresses at any of our facilities in 18 countries worldwide

Office Locator
Find the office or pick-up point nearest to you.

More from Shop & Ship:

18 shipping addresses worldwide:
Shop & Ship is an international shipping service for online shopping that allows you to shop from 18 countries around the world: The US, Canada, the UK, Germany, Italy, Spain, France, Turkey, South Africa, UAE, China, India, Hong Kong, Singapore, Malaysia, South Korea, Japan and Thailand.

Actual weight*:
We deliver your shopping at rates you will love because unlike other shippers who charge by size or volumetric weight, we go by Actual Weight. You save because you only pay for the ‘actual’ weight you ship vs. volumetric charges.

Money Back Guarantee*:
Another great reason for joining Shop & Ship Online: If at any time during the first year of having an active Shop & Ship account, you believe that our service did not meet your expectations, you can ask for a refund - no questions asked!

S&S Perfume*:
Is a service where you can shop for perfumes from UK, US, France, Germany, Italy and Spain using your S&S addresses. Find out more about S&S Perfume here

S&S Select*:
The S&S Select service allows you to shop online from the US for Perfumes, Nail Polish, Nail Polish Remover, Hair Spray, Hair Growth Products (spray or liquid), Deodorant Spray and Tanning Spray. Your purchases get shipped to your destination via your S&S New York address. Find out more about S&S Select here

S&S Protect*:
Enjoy more peace-of-mind when shopping cross-border. You can have all of your shipments above US$100 and up to US$2500 or equivalent protected against loss or damage. Shipments below US$ 100 are covered automatically by us. You can learn more about S&S Protect here

Lockers:
Find being available to receive shipments a hassle? Then get shipments delivered to an Aramex Locker closest to you. Pick up at your own convenience (available in select cities/countries)

So what are you waiting for? Download the new Shop & Ship app today and discover a new world of shopping, which is faster than standard international shipping, more convenient, smarter and cost effective.

* Terms and Conditions apply

• Now you can manage your addresses and select your preferred delivery option.

1. New Membership Plan FLEX: The new FLEX membership program is the new flexible way to shop and ship from any of your favorite cities! FLEX comes with all sorts of amazing benefits and value, you can check them all out in the table below. Activate S&S FLEX today for only USD 119/- per year and enjoy a new world of unbeatable online shopping.
